items.sentence: Tom is convinced Mary won't need to do that.
Tom is pretty sure he'll be able to do that.
Tom is the only one who isn't drinking beer.
Tom is the only one who isn't drinking wine.
Tom is the only one who was able to do that.
Tom is very worried about his wife's health.
Tom is sitting by himself on the back porch.
Tom was killed just after 2:30 this morning.
Tom will be told he doesn't need to do that.
We're not going to stay at that hotel again.
If Tom goes swimming, I'll go swimming, too.
Whenever I meet you, I think of your mother.
Since there was no taxi, I had to walk home.
Tom's dog had never been in a kennel before.
My closet is full of junk that I don't need.
Your complaint wasn't the first we received.
Tom is hoping Mary won't find out the truth.
Tom is worried that you won't like his gift.
I'm in no particular hurry to get back home.
My parents were both asleep when I got home.
